# dimensions(width:height:)

**Type Method**

Specifies the dimensions of the 2D texture.

## Declaration

```swift
static func dimensions(width: Int, height: Int) -> TextureResource.Dimensions2D
```

## Discussion

The content specifies the number of mipmap levels.
